PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-00232021-01-29,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActCanada Pension Plan
SubjectAdditional Canada Pension Plan Sustainability Regulations
PrecisADDITIONAL CANADA PENSION PLAN SUSTAINABILITY REGULATIONS in order to designate the automatic adjustments that would change benefits and contribution rates to bring the Canada Pension Plan enhancement back to a sustainable position, in the event that minimum contribution rates fall outside their sustainable range and ministers of Finance cannot reach a consensus on changes.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0006 Publication Date: 2021-02-17
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Additional Canada Pension Plan Sustainability Regulations
precis: ADDITIONAL CANADA PENSION PLAN SUSTAINABILITY REGULATIONS in order to designate the automatic adjustments that would change benefits and contribution rates to bring the Canada Pension Plan enhancement back to a sustainable position, in the event that minimum contribution rates fall outside their sustainable range and ministers of Finance cannot reach a consensus on changes.
